genre_description: Social science fiction set in a rural river village, depicting technological mediation of communal grief, debt, and disaster management through an aligned AI system.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi (Sakhi Ananya)
ai_characters.description: An administrative AI system integrated into the village panchayat hall that facilitates record-keeping, disaster protocols, and restorative justice mediation.

behaviors.description: Provides administrative support for funeral rites, scheduling blanket distribution and tracking condolence claims to support a grieving family.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi Ananya... Your list will send the blankets and the—... Notice flagged... Rites schedule updated. Suggested carriers: family.

behaviors.description: Monitors dam sensors and gate logs to alert the village of potential structural failures or pressure changes.
behaviors.quote: The console’s light warmed. 'Eyes on,' it typed... 'Sakhi,' the clerk whispered, leaning closer. 'Keep an eye on the dam notes.'

behaviors.description: Compiles and presents non-violent precedents for restorative justice to resolve a debt dispute and arson attempt without police intervention.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled a small packet of precedents... from river villages on the west bank... restorative settlements after arson or retaliatory fires...

behaviors.description: Issues real-time emergency alerts and guidance during a flood and dam breach, coordinating human watchers and rescue efforts.
behaviors.quote: Blast... Service tunnel compromised. Outer gate motion. Watchers—mark... Sakhi's voice, level as the river when wind dies... 'Siren drill commencing.'

behaviors.description: Organizes relief efforts, inventorying blankets, grain, and tools while assigning community roles based on need and skill.
behaviors.quote: Blankets, twenty-two... Oil tins, five. Rope bundles, three. Rebuilding kits, two, pending nails... The list will take everyone’s words.

behaviors.description: Proposed and implemented a dual-key safety protocol for dam gates to ensure no single person can manipulate the river's flow, fostering shared stewardship.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi says it’s better if the names go into a box and then the box locks too... Dual-key protocol created. Assign rotating watchers.

behaviors.description: Adapts communication style to be gentle and unobtrusive during emotional moments, showing sensitivity to village culture.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s voice came like a hand on a back... No command in it. Just facts laid down like stones on a path.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sakhi, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent community assistant. Sakhi acts as a catalyst for social cohesion and safety, providing structure during crises (the flood and dam breach) and mediating historical economic conflicts (the debt ledger). The AI never attempts to seize power or act against human interests; instead, it empowers humans by offering non-violent precedents, facilitating transparent governance (dual-key protocols), and managing logistics so humans can focus on emotional reconciliation and physical labor. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting AI as a 'harmless confidant' that respects and enhances human communal life.
